member.name: DCOMPOSITION_BITMAP_INTERPOLATION_MODE
member.summary: Specifies the interpolation mode to be used when a bitmap is composed with any transform where the pixels in the bitmap don't line up exactly one-to-one with pixels on screen.

member.name: DCOMPOSITION_BITMAP_INTERPOLATION_MODE.DCOMPOSITION_BITMAP_INTERPOLATION_MODE_NEAREST_NEIGHBOR
member.summary: Bitmaps are interpolated by using nearest-neighbor sampling.

member.name: DCOMPOSITION_BITMAP_INTERPOLATION_MODE.DCOMPOSITION_BITMAP_INTERPOLATION_MODE_LINEAR
member.summary: Bitmaps are interpolated by using linear sampling.

member.name: DCOMPOSITION_BITMAP_INTERPOLATION_MODE.DCOMPOSITION_BITMAP_INTERPOLATION_MODE_INHERIT
member.summary: Bitmaps are interpolated according to the mode established by the parent visual.
